spider.Description: An abnormally large, venomous spider with bloodshot eyes. Fast and lethal but not accurate

rat.Description: Previously uninterested in humans, since the incident, they have delveloped a taste for humans. Fast. Spitefull. Not too dangerous unless in a pack.

raged bird.Description: Not your average bird. Something is different about these birds. They aren't affraid of humans and will attack without notice.

skeleton.Description: This is what looks to be a human skeleton, but still alive. remnants of blood and flesh are still attached to some portions of their body. Slow. Powerful. Not Accurate. Dangerous.

death walker.Description: A fast, recently deceiced human. Still maintains their human characteristics as their body has not decayed yet. Fast, dangerous. Low stamina.

necromancer.Description: Not physically gifted, but will summon zombies, skeletons and death walkers or call birds or any animals from the local area to attack you.

black ops soldier.Description: A fast and accurate soldier from some 'government' orgainization

small drone.Description: A small arial drone. Fast. Limited ammunition. Not extremelly leathal.

large drone.Description: A large arial drone. Slow. Limited ammunition. Deadly. Not too acurate due to its speed, but will deal a lot of damage.

stationary turrent.Description: Fast repetative firing turrent. Not extreemly accurate. Used to ward off enemies.
